content: autumn by annie baker anniebakerdesigns com this asymmetrical scarf is knit in garter and open work stitches you start at one end and continue knitting until you run out of yarn or sooner if you reach the desired length you will need 4 5mm / us 7 needles and a minimum of 250 meters / 273 yards dk weight yarn for a larger scarf use a heavier yarn and larger needles enjoy materials 250 meters / 273 yards dk weight yarn 4 50 mm / us 7 needles gauge not crucial 20 stitches and 40 row = 4 inches gauge is not important abbreviations k = knit kfb = knit into front and back of next stitch k2t = knit two stitches together yo = yarn over needle to create one stitch ©copyright 2011 annie baker all rights reserved this pattern may be used for non-commercial personal use only it may not be used in any publication in print nor should it be reproduced in electronic/digital format without permission please do not share copy photograph or distribute this pattern instructions cast on 7 stitches row 1 k1 k2t yo k2t knit to last stitch kfb row 2 kfb k to end repeat row 1 and 2 another 13 times row 3 k1 k2t yo twice k2t knit to last stitch kfb row 4 kfb k to end repeat row 3 and 4 another 13 times row 5 k1 k2t yo three times k2t knit to last stitch kfb row 6 kfb k to end repeat row 5 and 6 another 13 times row 7 k1 k2t yo four times k2t knit to last stitch kfb row 8 kfb k to end repeat row 7 and 8 another 13 times row 9 k1 k2t yo five times k2t knit to last stitch kfb row 10 kfb k to end repeat row 9 and 10 another 13 times row 11 k1 k2t yo six times k2t knit to last stitch kfb row 12 kfb k to end repeat row 11 and 12 another 13 times row 13 k1 k2t yo seven times k2t knit to last stitch kfb row 14 kfb k to end repeat row 13 and 14 another 13 times row 15 k1 k2t yo eight times k2t knit to last stitch kfb row 16 kfb k to end repeat row 15 and16 another 13 times or more if longer scarf is desired cast off ©copyright 2011 annie baker all rights reserved this pattern may be used for non-commercial personal use only it may not be used in any publication in print nor should it be reproduced in electronic/digital format without permission please do not share copy photograph or distribute this pattern
